brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is evaluate the safety and tolerability parameters regarding the
      new drug in healthy men and evaluate the pharmacokinetics parameters after one dose and
      multiple doses of the new drug.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess Tolerability, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of a New Drug
